content.en: AI-Enhanced Colonoscopy: Artificial intelligence (AI) is being used to improve the diagnosis and detection of colorectal polyps during colonoscopy procedures. These AI systems assist in real-time detection of polyps, improving the accuracy and effectiveness of the procedure. They have been shown to reduce miss rates, increase adenoma detection, and potentially save costs by optimizing the use of colonoscopy. However, the implementation of AI in colonoscopy still faces challenges that need to be addressed for widespread adoption.
content.da: AI-forbedret koloskopi: Kunstig intelligens (AI) bliver brugt til at forbedre diagnosen og detektionen af kolorektale polypper under koloskopiprocedurer. Disse AI-systemer assisterer med realtidspåvisning af polypper, hvilket forbedrer nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af proceduren. De har vist sig at reducere oversete polypper, øge adenompåvisningen og potentielt spare omkostninger ved at optimere brugen af koloskopi. Implementeringen af AI i koloskopi står dog stadig over for udfordringer, der skal adressere for bredere anvendelse.
